briefTitle: An Open-Label Extension Trial to Assess the Safety of Long-Term Treatment of Rotigotine in Early-Stage Parkinson's Disease.
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension to the Double-Blind SP512 Trial to Assess the Safety of Long-Term Treatment of Rotigotine in Subjects With Early-Stage Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease.
summary: The objective of this open-label extension is to assess the safety and tolerability of long-term treatment of the rotigotine patch in subjects with early-stage idiopathic Parkinson's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With at Least One Adverse Event During This Open-label Extension Study
